Chocolate Chip Cookies
Benjamin Smith
7 October 2023

This chocolate chip cookie recipe has earned global recognition as the best ever! The texture is soft yet firm. Warm the day with this wonderful cookie recipe!

Makes 20 cookies
Ingredients:
  • 1 cup salted butter (softened)
  • 1 cup white sugar
  • 1 cup brown sugar
  • 2 teaspoons vanilla extract
  • 2 large eggs
  • 3 cups flour
  • 1 teaspoon baking soda
  • Â½ teaspoon baking powder
  • 1 teaspoon salt
  • 2 cups chocolate chips
Cooking Instructions:
  1. Preheat oven to 375 degrees Farhenheit
  2. Mix flour, baking soda, and salt
  3. In separate bowl, mix butter and sugars
  4. Add and mix eggs and vanilla
  5. Mix in the dry ingredients
  6. Add chocolate chips and mix
  7. Scoop 1-inch balls onto the cookie sheet
  8. Bake for 8-10 minutes
  9. Let sit for 2 minutes
  10. Remove and place on cooling rack
QTY Makes
1 20 cookies
2 40 cookies
3 60 cookies
4 80 cookies
